    • Constructor Detail

      • XHost

        public XHost(org.simgrid.msg.Host h,
             int memSize,
             int ncores,
             int totalCPUCapa,
             int netBW,
             java.lang.String ip)
        Constructor Please note that by default a XHOST is off (you should invoke turnOn)
        Parameters:
        h - MSG host to extend
        memSize - the size of the memory of the host (rigid value, once it has been assigned it does not change)
        ncores - the number of cores available on the host
        totalCPUCapa - the total cpu capacity of the host
        netBW - the network bandwidth of the host
        ip - the ip of the host

        public boolean isViable()
        check whether a pm is viable or not (currently only for the CPU dimension)
        Returns:
        boolean true if the PM is non viable (i.e. overloaded from the CPU viewpoint)
